divs: Sighting DetailsChildren playing outside, observed a bright light near the horizon in thedistance with an apparent diamond shape. Airplanes or helicopters seemed to bearound it. After losing sight of the object for a few minutes, they observed itagain momentarily while returning home. Total duration approximately fiveminutes.
Summary: Children see bright moving light in Michigan.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Mt Clemens
There were no other sightings in Mt Clemens on or around April 26th 2000
